proportion_of_features_with_na¶

pymeta.meta_features.proportion_of_features_with_na(X: numpy.array, y: numpy.array = None) → float¶

Proportion of features with missing values.

Parameters

  • X (numpy.array) – 2d-array with features columns.

  • y (numpy.array) – Array of response values.

Returns

Number of features with missing values over total number of features.

Return type

float
